text: Angel tube station is a London Underground station in The Angel, Islington. It is on the Bank branch of the Northern line, between Old Street and King's Cross St. Pancras stations. It is in Travelcard Zone 1. ==Gallery== Image:Angel station southbound look north.jpg|The extra-wide southbound platform was formerly an island platform, View looking north Image:Gb-lu- Angel-southbound.jpg|Southbound platform looking south Image:Angel station northbound look south.JPG|Northbound platform looking south, built when the original island platform was reconstructed Image:Angel station roundel.JPG|Platform roundel Image:Escalator at Angel Underground Station.jpg|Escalator ==References== ==Oher websites== *London's Transport Museum Photographic Archive ** ** ** ** Category:Northern line stations Category:London Travelcard zone 1 Category:Tube stations in the London Borough of Islington
title: Angel tube station
